title: How to Unrar a File: A Step-by-Step Guide for Any Device

steps.title: Right-click the RAR file and select Extract all….
steps.content: Right-click the RAR file and select Extract all… . Now that Windows 11 comes with built-in RAR support, you don't need to download a third-party app to extract RAR files—they can be uncompressed just like ZIP files ). [1] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source While Windows 11 makes it easy to unrar files, you still can't create RAR files without a third-party app like WinRAR or 7-Zip. If the RAR file is protected by a password, or you need to extract a series of RAR files (usually files ending with extensions like .r04, .r05, etc.), use the Windows 10 method instead.

steps.title: Choose where to extract the RAR file.
steps.content: Choose where to extract the RAR file. If you want to extract the file to the current folder, you can leave the default folder in the field. Otherwise, click the Browse… button to select a different location.

steps.title: Click Extract.
steps.content: Click Extract . This unrars the file and displays the extracted contents in a new window.

steps.title: Download the 7-Zip installer.
steps.content: Download the 7-Zip installer. 7-Zip is free, open-source file-archiver software that opens and manages RAR files in Windows. Here's how to install it: Click the Download link next to your version of Windows ( 32-bit or 64-bit ). Save the installer to your computer.

steps.title: Run the 7-Zip installer.
steps.content: Run the 7-Zip installer. Double-click the installer and follow the on-screen instructions to install 7-Zip on your PC.

steps.title: Double-click the RAR file to open it in 7-Zip.
steps.content: Double-click the RAR file to open it in 7-Zip. If it doesn't open in 7-Zip, right-click the RAR file, select Open with , and then choose 7-Zip File Manager . If you're extracting a multi-part RAR file, double-click the first one in the series.

steps.title: Click the Extract button.
steps.content: Click the Extract button. It's the dark blue minus sign at the top of the 7-Zip window.

steps.title: Select a location and click OK.
steps.content: Select a location and click OK . Choose where to extract the compressed files (if different from the default), then click OK to unrar the files. You can now find the compressed files in the folder you selected.

steps.title: Install The Unarchiver from the App Store.
steps.content: Install The Unarchiver from the App Store. The Unarchiver is a free macOS app that easily extracts RAR files and many other compressed file types. [2] X Research source If you don't want to get it from the App Store , you can also download and install it from https://theunarchiver.com . [3] X Research source

steps.title: Control-click the RAR file you want to extract.
steps.content: Control-click the RAR file you want to extract. To extract a RAR file with multiple parts, control-click the first file in the series (usually ending .R00, .part1, etc.).

steps.title: Select Open With > The Unarchiver.
steps.content: Select Open With > The Unarchiver . This extracts the files and places them into a new folder in the current directory.

steps.title: Install Unrar from your distribution's repositories.
steps.content: Install Unrar from your distribution's repositories. Unrar isn't preinstalled in any version of Linux, but you will be able to find it in most distributions default repositories . For example, if you're using Ubuntu, Debian, or another Debian-based distribution, use apt install unrar to install Unrar. If you can't find Unrar, check out How to Unrar Files in Linux to learn how to compile Unrar from source.

steps.title: cd
steps.content: cd into the directory containing the RAR file. For example, use cd ~/Downloads to enter the Downloads directory.

steps.title: Use unrar x filename.rar to unrar the file.
steps.content: Use unrar x filename.rar to unrar the file. The compressed files and folders inside the RAR archive will be extracted to the current directory. [4] X Research source If you'd rather unrar the files to a different directory, use {{kbd}|unrar x filename.rar /path/to/directory }. If the RAR file is protected by a password, enter the password when prompted. If you're extracting a multiple-part RAR file (e.g., a file ending with .rar00, .rar01, .r01, .r012, etc.), you'll only need to unrar the first file in the series to extract all files.

steps.title: Use the RAR app for Android.
steps.content: Use the RAR app for Android. On an Android phone or tablet, you'll need to install a third-party app to unrar files. RAR by RARLAB is a free file that makes it easy to extract RAR files. Just install it from the Play Store , open the RAR app, navigate to your RAR file, and follow the on-screen instructions.

steps.title: Use WinZip for iPhone & iPad.
steps.content: Use WinZip for iPhone & iPad. WinZip is a trusted developer, and their iOS app makes unpacking RAR files a breeze. Just download WinZip from the App Store , open the app, navigate to your RAR file, tap it, and follow the on-screen instructions.
